answers.answer: Hello,It can be due to pinched spinal nerves, spinal cord pathology, metabolic disorders like diabetes, hypothyroidism, and hypoparathyroidism. They can also be due to peripheral vascular disease, vitamin B12 deficiency or malnutrition.Get your blood sugar and thyroid hormones levels evaluated. You can take some vit B12 for some days and see if the tingling is gone or not.In case the symptoms persist then please consult a neurologist as it can be due to some neurological disorder. I hope it helps. Take care and regards.

question: I've been suffering for 18 months with this unusual sensation, my groin area/penis testicles/back of my buttocks/upper legs get hot tingling etc and clammy which never goes away.   Some days are worse than others, it seems that when I sit it elevates the pain.  Has anyone else experienced this problem or found a cure? please help?
title: clammy groin area hot cold tingling upper legs penis etc
